contents.p: This coffin belonged to a woman who was buried near the city of Akhmim in the Ptolemaic period. Her coffin, as well as her mummy and cartonnage mummy-trappings were purchased on the antiquities market by George Reisner, for the growing Egyptian collection of Phoebe Hearst.

text.desc: Panel on Lower Legs, Columns read from viewer right to left.

frag.al: Dd md.w (i)n wsir xnty {imn.tyw} tA.wy n x.t
frag.tr: Recitation by Osiris, foremost (of the westerners): The two lands are ready for the measuring-stick, the White Crown...
...is ready for the statue. The standard is ready for Osiris-Wenennefer.

frag.al: ink pw Xrd sp-fd i ib
frag.tr: I am a child! (x4) Oh, kid...

frag.al: wr iw Dd=k n min apr
frag.tr: ...of the Great One, you said today: "Equip...

frag.al: nm.t m rx{r}.n(=k) i(i)=k r=s m
frag.tr: ...the slaughter-house with what you have learned when you arrive to it as...

frag.al: is(f) wr ink ra smn n Hs.(wt) D.t
frag.tr: ...The Marrow of the Great One. I am Re, established of praise, forever!

text.desc: Long vertical inscription on edge of basin, viewer lef
text.al: Dd md.w (i)n wsir xnty-imnty.w nTr aA nb AbDw ptH-zqr{k}-wsir nTr aA Hry-ib qrs As.t-wr.t mw.t nTr nb.t-Hw.t sn.t nTr
text.tr: Recitation by Osiris, foremost of the westerners, the great god, lord of Abydos, and Ptah-Sokar-Osiris, the great god, one who is in the tomb, and Isis the Great, mother of the god, and Nepthys, sister of the God and Imsety, Hapy, and Duamutef: "Forever".

text.desc: Long vertical inscription on the edge of basin, viewer right.
text.al: Dd md.w (i)n wsir xnty-imnty.w nTr aA nb AbDw ptH-zqr{k}-wsir nTr aA Hry-ib qrs As.t-wr.t mw.t nTr nb.t-Hw.t sn.t nTr
text.tr: Recitation by Osiris foremost of the Westerners, great god, lord of Abydos, and Ptah-Sokar-Osiris, great god, one who is in the tomb, and Isis the Great, mother of the god, and Nepthys, sisters of the god, and Anubis, lord of the two holy lands, and Anubis who oversees the Divine Pavillion: "Making protection for Osiris Forever".
